Installation Steps
==================

This guide will walk you through the steps to install Big Blue Button.

Prerequisites
-------------

Before you begin, ensure you have the following prerequisites:

- Prerequisite 1
- Prerequisite 2
- ...

Step 1: Download and Install
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Follow these steps to download and install Big Blue Button:

1. Download the installation package from [URL].
2. Extract the package: ``tar -zxvf package.tar.gz``
3. Install dependencies: ``sudo apt-get install ...``

Step 2: Configuration
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Configure Big Blue Button with the following steps:

1. Edit the configuration file: ``/etc/bbb/config.yml``
2. Set the necessary parameters.

...
